content: autumn in montreal socks @knitpurldesign by victoria malevich knit purl design@gmail com materials drops fabel yarn 2 skeins 205 m 224 yds in 50 g size us 0 2 mm for the cuff us 1 2 25 mm double pointed needles or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle scissors gauge in stockinette sts 8 sts=1 inch or 32 sts=10 cm 9 row=1 inch or 35 row=10 cm sizes small fits women s shoe size 5-6 us/can medium fits women s shoe size 7-8 us/can large fits women s shoe size 9-10 us/can abbreviations used st s =stitch es *…*=repeat k=knit k2tog=knit 2 stitches together as one p=purl p2tog=purl 2 stitches together as one rs=right side yo=yarn over ws=wrong side ssk=slip 2 stitches knitwise one at a time and knit together through the back loop sl=slip tbl=through the back loop s2kp=slip 2 stitches together knit 1 pass 2 stitches over knit 1 @knitpurldesign - © copyright 2024 all rights reserved cuff cast on 60 sts for all sizes on us 0 2 mm needles distribute sts as 15 sts on each of 4 needles and join to work in the round careful not to twist sts work as k1 p1 ribbing for 10 row switch the needles to size us 1 2 25 mm start chart and work 42 row in total heel flap sl 30 sts onto one needle and knit back and forth as follows row 1 rs sl1 *k1 sl1* purl last st turn work row 2 ws sl1 p to the end of the needle turn work row 3 rs sl1 *sl1 k1* purl last st turn work row 4 ws sl1 p to the end of the needle turn work complete row 1-4 to a total of 30 row from the beginning of the heel flap heel turn row 1 rs k11 *sl1 k1* 4 times ssk turn work row 2 ws sl1 p8 p2tog turn work row 3 rs sl1 *k1 sl1* 4 times ssk turn work row 4 ws sl1 p8 p2tog turn work row 5 rs sl1 *sl1 k1* 4 times ssk turn work row 6 ws sl1 p8 p2tog turn work repeat row 3-6 until all heel sts have been finished ending on a ws row 10 sts remaining knit across these remaining sts gusset decreases with rs facing you pick up and knit 16 sts along the first side of the heel flap knit across 30 sts it will be 1st row of the chart with rs facing you pick up and knit 16 sts along the other side of the heel flap then use the same needle to knit half of the remaining heel sts @knitpurldesign - © copyright 2024 all rights reserved the rounds now start at the centre of the heel sts continue with the pattern next row is row 2 from the chart on needles 1 and 4 knit stockinette sts in every row decrease the amount of sts on the needle #1 and #4 knit
